DOC.brief_summary: Our primary objective is to develop a clinical pathway for care of patients having colorectal surgery at the Clinic. In particular, the investigators would like to determine what intraoperative concentration of oxygen is optimal in our patients.
DOC.brief_title: Supplemental Oxygen in Colorectal Surgery: A Quality Improvement Project
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators therefore propose to test the primary hypothesis that supplemental oxygen (80% versus 30%) reduces the risk of a composite of surgical sites infection and potentially oxygen-related wound complications. Secondarily, the investigators will assess the incremental cost benefit of 80% versus 30% oxygen.
